extendedIngredients.name: baby bok choy
extendedIngredients.original: 1 lb baby bok choy, bottom root ball cut off and discarded, rinsed thoroughly, torn into smaller pieces

extendedIngredients.name: canola oil
extendedIngredients.original: 1 Tbsp grapeseed oil or canola oil

extendedIngredients.original: 4 green onions, chopped, including green parts that are not dried out

extendedIngredients.name: yellow bell peppers

title: Baby Bok Choy With Yellow Bell Peppers
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Baby Bok Choy With Yellow Bell Peppers a try. One serving contains 101 calories, 2g of protein, and 7g of fat. For $1.5 per serving, this recipe covers 12% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. 101 person were glad they tried this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, whole 30, and vegan diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. If you have bell peppers, canolan oil, green onions, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is brought to you by Simply Recipes. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 68%, which is good.
